General.Name: Wuxi Zhenhua Auto Parts Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Wuxi Zhenhua Auto Parts Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells auto parts. It develops, produces, and sells automotive stamping and welding parts, as well as provides sub-assembly and assembly processing services and molds. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Wuxi, China.
General.Address: No. 188, Lu Ou East Road, Wuxi, China, 214161
